kellan kollan kanthawan yuda peramunata ya nohaki wayowruddhayan podu sthana ho gam pradhaninge ha wedaralalage niweswala wi ketima, kurakkan ambaarima, badairingu, idal iringu kota sakasima atukos damima, iwum pihum kirima, oෟshadha warga ekathu kirima, beheth ambaarima, ketima, rathkirima, prathikarawalata sahaya dima aahara saha bethheth kandawuru aasannayata genayama, wanara satan sandaha wewal kobba wal kirindiwalwalin gethima, eewata aluth nugakola athu ellima, eethala muwahath kirima, dunuwalata lanu ambaarima, rogi sebalunta sathkara prathikara kirima, daruwan saha gawayan balaganima wani dahasak katayuthuwala niyali sitithi.
